data.comment: The match has started, with Crotone kicking-off.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 1, Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Free kick for Crotone in the half of Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 5, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crotone are pushing forward but Niccolo Zanellato's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Crotone.
In the minute 6, Fabio Maresca signals a Crotone throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Crotone.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio's Bruno Alves is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Crotone pushes forward through Junior Messias, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Fabio Maresca awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Crotone.
In the minute 15, Fabio Maresca signals a Crotone throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
In the minute 17, Crotone's Arkadiusz Reca misses with an attempt on goal.
Fabio Maresca awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Throw-in Crotone.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Parma Calcio.
Fabio Maresca signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Parma Calcio's area.
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Can Crotone capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Parma Calcio's half?
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 23, Yann Karamoh for Parma Calcio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Junior Messias puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Arkadiusz Reca.
Parma Calcio's Roberto Inglese is whistled for offside at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 26, In Crotone Parma Calcio's Simon Sohm is caught offside.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Crotone capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Crotone's Vladimir Golemic goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 30, Fabio Maresca awards Crotone a goal kick.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Yann Karamoh for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 32, Jasmin Kurtic (Parma Calcio) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 33, At Stadio Ezio Scida, Jasmin Kurtic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, In Crotone, Roberto Inglese of Parma Calcio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 38, Crotone have a dangerous throw-in.
Parma Calcio needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 43, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
Great finish from Junior Messias to give Crotone a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 44, Salvatore Molina with an assist there.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Parma Calcio.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Parma Calcio's Hernani has been booked in Crotone.
It's Parma Calcio with the kick-off after the break.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
The away team replace Maxime Busi with Simone Iacoponi.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Simon Sohm with Juan Brunetta. This is the second substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
Juraj Kucka is booked for the away team.
In the minute 47, Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Roberto Inglese (Parma Calcio) has received a yellow card from Fabio Maresca.
Pedro Pereira is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 48, Pedro Pereira returns to the field for Crotone after picking up a slight injury.
Parma Calcio are coming forward and Juan Brunetta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
In the minute 49, Crotone needs to be cautious. Parma Calcio have an attacking throw-in.
Fabio Maresca signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Crotone's half.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 50, Parma Calcio attack but Yordan Osorio's header doesn't find the target.
Crotone have a goal kick.
The match at Stadio Ezio Scida has been interrupted briefly for a check on Riccardo Gagliolo, who is down injured.
In the minute 52, Riccardo Gagliolo is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Crotone.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 54, Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Crotone drive upfield and Pedro Pereira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Parma Calcio defender.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Giuseppe Cuomo for Crotone has been booked by Fabio Maresca and receives a first yellow card.
Can Parma Calcio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Fabio Maresca signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Crotone's half.
In the minute 57, Important block from the Crotone defence as Yann Karamoh fires in a strike for Parma Calcio.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Goal for Parma Calcio! They are now just 2-1 behind thanks to a Juraj Kucka header.
In the minute 57, Great play from Juan Brunetta to set up the goal.
Throw-in high up the field for Parma Calcio in Crotone.
Simeon Nwankwo is replacing Emmanuel Riviere for the home team.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Andreas Cornelius is on a sub for Roberto Inglese for Parma Calcio.
Fabio Maresca blows against Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo for offside.
In the minute 61, Parma Calcio drives forward and Yann Karamoh gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Jasmin Kurtic (Parma Calcio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Crotone.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Giovanni Stroppa (Crotone) is making a second substitution, with Lisandro Magallan replacing Giuseppe Cuomo.
In the minute 65, Juan Brunetta (Parma Calcio) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Crotone defenders.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 67, Parma Calcio push forward at Stadio Ezio Scida and Andreas Cornelius gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Crotone defence.
Fabio Maresca awards the away team a throw-in.
Andreas Cornelius of Parma Calcio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 68, Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
In the minute 71, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In Crotone Parma Calcio attack through Jasmin Kurtic. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Crotone drives forward and Simeon Nwankwo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Crotone.
Hernani is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Fabio Maresca signals a throw-in for Parma Calcio, close to Crotone's area.
In the minute 76, It seems as if Hernani is unable to continue. Wylan Cyprien replaces him for the away team.
Crotone have a dangerous throw-in.
Parma Calcio's Juraj Kucka is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Crotone.
Vladimir Golemic (Crotone) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 80, Parma Calcio needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Crotone.
In the minute 81, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Parma Calcio will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Crotone.
In the minute 83, Crotone's Milos Vulic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Crotone.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Crotone.
Lautaro Valenti is replacing Yordan Osorio for Parma Calcio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Crotone pushes forward through Junior Messias, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
In the minute 87, Fabio Maresca awards Crotone a goal kick.
Salvatore Molina (Crotone) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Wylan Cyprien (Parma Calcio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 89, Fabio Maresca awards the away team a throw-in.
Fabio Maresca waits before resuming play because Niccolo Zanellato for Crotone is still down.
Niccolo Zanellato, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Jacopo Petriccione is the substitute for Crotone.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Crotone.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Cordaz is back on the pitch.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Fabio Maresca blows against Crotone's Junior Messias for offside.
Juraj Kucka of Parma Calcio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Arkadiusz Reca (Crotone) has received a yellow card from Fabio Maresca.
Simone Iacoponi for Parma Calcio has been booked by Fabio Maresca and receives a first yellow card.
Sebastiano Luperto (Crotone) gets a yellow card.
Attention is being given to Crotoneâ€™s Alex Cordaz and play has been suspended briefly.
